short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delivers a new self-love message each time you open up a new tab on your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The I Love Me tab has been built to display impactful self-loving reminder messages when searching the web. To re-enforce the importance of how and why the act of loving the person you see in the mirror is so important. Whilst displaying a backdrop of feel-good and light-hearted images that will add a sense of joy and contentment to your day.

By clicking ‘Add to Chrome’ and installing this desktop extension, you are accepting and agreeing to install the I Love Me extension, and understand that your new tab will be replaced to that provided by the service with Yahoo search results, and the Privacy and Terms of Use of the extension.

Don't neglect one very important relationship in life. With you. Accept and love yourself as you are. Be kind to yourself. Forgive yourself. Love yourself like you do others. Improve your relationship with you. And by improving your relationship with you, you will find that your relationship with others will also improve. It will make you happier. More self-aware. More grateful. It will improve your life. It will give you an enhanced regard for your own happiness and well-being. And allow you to reach your full potential in life.

Privacy Policy: https://validclickapps.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://validclickapps.com/terms-of-service/
